forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 8C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 49F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -3C with temps rising to -1 to 1. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 8 to 12 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to some clearing during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low 24F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will taper off as a few snow showers overnight. Low -8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will diminish to a few snow showers overnight. Low 21F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Morning high of 1C with temps falling to -6 to -4. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Morning high of 36F with temps falling to near 25. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with snow developing later during the night. Low -8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with snow developing later during the night. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 17F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 18F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.
